div.head: MARS
div.p: MARS is a service of Mason Publishing, part of the George Mason University Libraries. Home of the Electronic Dissertations and Thesis as well as faculty research publications and data files, MARS provides access to the intellectual work of the Mason community.
MARS is set up to help you comply with Open Access mandates for your research data and publications. To start publishing your content in MARS, please contact us by using our online form.
